content: Great little App, and was very accurate on my Sony Xperia XZ Premium just using the standard set up. no further calibration was required ! Well done Guys

content: I've browsed the ruler apps for a while and this one seemed to be the most useful one. Very functional options, easy to manage. UPDATE 2: We have added the requested functionality to set exact sizes using keyboard along with fractions and other improvements, please check latest update. Thanks!

VisTech.Projects Team.
